summary: Allows the player to gain additional health per level.
descriptionHtml:
==================================================================
= DFB - Additional Health Per Level
==================================================================

Other mod(s) you might like:
DFB Carry Weight Per Stamina: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4842

==========
=Overview=
==========
-Allows the player to gain additional health per level on top the picked stat.

-Always seemed to feel like something was missing, and this was it. Always figured as an adventurer working hard and all that you would be more, well, toughened up. So with that in place, the player can choose how much they would want added per level on top their selection.

====================
= Current Settings =
====================
+ 1 Additional Health per Level.
+ 2 Additional Health per Level.
+ 3 Additional Health per Level.
+ 4 Additional Health per Level.
+ 5 Additional Health per Level.
+ 6 Additional Health per Level.
+ 7 Additional Health per Level.
+ 8 Additional Health per Level.
+ 9 Additional Health per Level.
+ 10 Additional Health per Level.
+ 11 Additional Health per Level.
+ 12 Additional Health per Level.
+ 13 Additional Health per Level.
+ 14 Additional Health per Level.
+ 15 Additional Health per Level.
+ 16 Additional Health per Level.
+ 17 Additional Health per Level.
+ 18 Additional Health per Level.
+ 19 Additional Health per Level.
+ 20 Additional Health per Level.

==============
=Known Issues=
==============
+Does not apply additional health to old saves. Only new levels.

=================
=Version History=
=================
=Version 1.0=
+Initial Release
author: Darkfirebird
